rows.label: tlk42100121_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Takaka has made another
discovery of the century, mo.

rows.label: tlk42100121_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Takaka noticed it while watching
the Driver scout below, mo.

rows.label: tlk42100121_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Among the Blades that have been resonated
with, there are some that rarely hold an
incredible amount of potential, mo.

rows.label: tlk42100121_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Heaven's Holy Grail? The Jewel of
Superbia? Takaka had a feeling they
could be even stronger than that, mo.

rows.label: tlk42100121_04_msg0005
rows.name:
At a glance, they look like
ordinary Blades, but... Takaka
felt that potential intensely, mo.

rows.label: tlk42100121_04_msg0006
rows.name:
So, if a Driver tries hard,
the day should come when they
can meet such a Blade, mo.
